A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Disliked the Prequels\, but at least George Lucas had some self awareness that the audience would like a lightsaber fight from Yoda. All this hype to get to Luke Skywalker in the TFA AND all the potential Special effects in this day and age and we don't even get a taste or see a fraction of his power? I'm sure projecting yourself across the galaxy is pretty powerful\, but give him a green lightsaber and let him do some damage like his father was so famous for.  Disrespect to Luke Skywalker.
